name: LibreWorks
description:
Our main field of expertise is custom software development for businesses with emphasis on web and enterprise applications for e.g. data workflows and technical / business process automation.
Since 2013, our solutions have been helping our clients cut costs, introduce time savings, increase overall employee performance and open new possibilities.
Our flexible team works using agile methods and is always open for new challenges. We find solutions for even the hardest of problems and never let our customers down.
If we decide to take on a project, we will work hard until we implement a satisfying solution.
We are experienced in creating and delivering high quality results that best satisfy business requirements, but are always on the lookout for possible improvements to our services.
We offer full life cycle services:
consulting
analysis & requirements management
prototyping & design
implementation & deployment
maintenance & support
